price: 14. Argi Jis nežino tų, kuriuos Jis sukūrė, kai Jis yra Maloniausias, Visa Žinantis?
arabic: أَلَا يَعۡلَمُ مَنۡ خَلَقَ وَهُوَ ٱللَّطِيفُ ٱلۡخَبِيرُ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: alā yaʿlamu man khalaqa wahuwa al-laṭīfu al-khabīru
